description: Go behind the scene of this Lucas Entertainment blockbuster! Sexy porn stars Jonathan Agassi and Adam Killian show us what it takes to prep for a porn shoot with two of the hottest fuckers around! Then Carsten Andersson and Aaron Mark are on the set of "Trapped in the Game" in Berlin with their cocks out ready to suck and fuck! Following Carsten and Aaron are Giuseppe Pardi and Rob Nelson on set, and who else could they possibly star with in "Trapped in the Game" other than Jonathan Agassi himself. Watch as they work with him in their awesome threesome! And the one and only Harry Louis rounds out the fun better than anyone else!
title: Go Behind the Scenes of "Trapped in the Game"
